mapper.insert: insert into usercitys (id, province, the_city, county, street, address, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update usercitys set province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_city = #{theCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, province, the_city, county, street, address, user_id from usercitys
